sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { listProductDetails} from "../actions/productAction"; import Rating from '../components/Rating' function ProductScreen({match}) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const producDetail = useSelector((state) => state.producDetail); const { error, loading, product } = producDetail; useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) },[dispatch] ) return (
{product.name} Go Back

{product.name}

 Price : ${products.price} Description : {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ? 'In Stock' :'Out Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
